mapper.insert: insert into order_details (line_id, order_id, cloth_id, cloth_style, amount, price, fabric_code, style, actual_amount, size, lining_type, process_price, process_actual_price, technology_code, delivery_date, delivery_code, final_delivery_date, status, syscode, warehouse_date, is_delete, discount_price, price_retail, start_production_date, push_factory_date, push_factory_state, push_factory_message, bonus_price, gift_card_price,head_id) values (#{lineId}, #{orderId}, #{clothId}, #{clothStyle}, #{amount}, #{price}, #{fabricCode}, #{style}, #{actualAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{size}, #{liningType}, #{processPrice}, #{processActualPrice}, #{technologyCode}, #{deliveryDate}, #{deliveryCode}, #{finalDeliveryDate}, #{status}, #{syscode}, #{warehouseDate}, #{isDelete}, #{discountPrice}, #{priceRetail}, #{startProductionDate}, #{pushFactoryDate}, #{pushFactoryState}, #{pushFactoryMessage}, #{bonusPrice}, #{giftCardPrice},#{headId})
mapper.update: update order_details set order_id = #{orderId}, cloth_id = #{clothId}, cloth_style = #{clothStyle}, amount = #{amount}, price = #{price}, fabric_code = #{fabricCode}, style = #{style}, actual_amount = #{actualAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, size = #{size}, lining_type = #{liningType}, process_price = #{processPrice}, process_actual_price = #{processActualPrice}, technology_code = #{technologyCode}, delivery_date = #{deliveryDate}, delivery_code = #{deliveryCode}, final_delivery_date = #{finalDeliveryDate}, status = #{status}, syscode = #{syscode}, warehouse_date = #{warehouseDate}, is_delete = #{isDelete}, discount_price = #{discountPrice}, price_retail = #{priceRetail}, start_production_date = #{startProductionDate}, push_factory_date = #{pushFactoryDate}, push_factory_state = #{pushFactoryState}, push_factory_message = #{pushFactoryMessage}, bonus_price = #{bonusPrice}, gift_card_price = #{giftCardPrice}, head_id=#{headId} where line_id = #{lineId}
mapper.select: select line_id, order_id, cloth_id, cloth_style, amount, price, fabric_code, style, actual_amount, size, lining_type, process_price, process_actual_price, technology_code, delivery_date, delivery_code, final_delivery_date, status, syscode, warehouse_date, is_delete, discount_price, price_retail, start_production_date, push_factory_date, push_factory_state, push_factory_message, bonus_price, gift_card_price,head_id from order_details where line_id = #{lineId}

select line_id, order_id, cloth_id, cloth_style, amount, price, fabric_code, style, actual_amount, size, lining_type, process_price, process_actual_price, technology_code, delivery_date, delivery_code, final_delivery_date, status, syscode, warehouse_date, is_delete, discount_price, price_retail, start_production_date, push_factory_date, push_factory_state, push_factory_message, bonus_price, gift_card_price,head_id from order_details
